nodes.explanation: phrases related to actions or decisions being made in the name of something or someone
phrases related to invoking or calling upon some authority, often in the context of justifying certain actions or beliefs
proper names or titles mentioned in text
phrases related to invoking authority or responsibility in the name of a cause or concept
phrases or expressions related to doing something in someone's name
phrases related to actions done in the name of something or someone
phrases related to taking action or making decisions based on a set identity or belief
phrases related to invoking a higher power or authority
